name: Digtoise

aura.name: drill_crusher
aura.description: When activated, performs Shell Spin, follows the player while spinning, and mines ores efficiently.

description: A walking contradiction, possessing the strongest shell and the only drill capable of piercing it. "Digtoise's Fable" is a popular children's tale.

skills.name: aqua_gun
skills.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

skills.name: stone_blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: shell_spin
skills.description: Digtoise's exclusive skill. Moves while spinning its whole body at high speeds. Drills through enemies, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: stone_cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: sand_tornado
skills.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: aqua_burst
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: rock_lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.
